org.mt4j.components
Class StateChangeSupport

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.components.StateChangeSupport

public class StateChangeSupport
extends java.lang.Object

The Class StateChangeSupport. A helper class to delegate state change event handling and dispatching to.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a PropertyChangeSupport object.

Method Detail

addStateChangeListener

public void addStateChangeListener(StateChange state,
                                   StateChangeListener listener)
Add a StateChangeListener to the listener map. If listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.

Parameters:
state - the state
listener - The StateChangeListener to be added

newArray

protected StateChangeListener[] newArray(int length)
Creates a new array of listeners of the specified size.

Parameters:
length - the length
Returns:
the state change listener[]

removeStateChangeListener

public void removeStateChangeListener(StateChange state,
                                      StateChangeListener listener)
Removes a StateChangeListener to the listener map. Throws no error if the listener isnt found.

Parameters:
state - the state
listener - the listener

fireStateChange

public void fireStateChange(StateChange state)
Fire state change.

Parameters:
state - the state that has changed

fireStateChange

public void fireStateChange(StateChangeEvent evt)
Fire an existing StateChangeEvent to any registered listeners.

Parameters:
evt - The StateChangeEvent object.

getListeners

public final StateChangeListener[] getListeners()
Returns all listeners in the map.

Returns:
an array of all listeners

getListeners

public final StateChangeListener[] getListeners(StateChange state)
Returns listeners that have been associated with the named state.

Parameters:
state - the name of the property
Returns:
an array of listeners for the named property

hasListeners

public final boolean hasListeners(StateChange state)
Indicates whether the map contains at least one listener to be notified.

Parameters:
state - the state
Returns:
true if at least one listener exists or false otherwise
